comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: Could this be Andrew James Peters? He was a U.S. Representative (1907-14), U.S. Assistant Secretary of the Treasury (1914-18), and mayor of Boston (1918-22).

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Bingo!  The dome is distinctive.  We'll add full name to the record.  Thanks!
